comment: Just PowerPoints, notes and chapter exams & one group discussion, weekly discussion posts shes so encouraging and so sweet! She is the best! Final was a five minute video about how covid impacted me! She is such a pure soul!

Professor Morrison is a great professor for this topic. Her knowledge shows through greatly. Readings, lots of writing, discussion posts every week, 3 tests and a paper. Not difficult at all, just takes some time and effort.

An amazing professor! It involves a lot of writing - weekly discussion posts and a final paper - but they're not difficult. If you read the weekly articles you'll do good on the discussions and my final paper was only 3ish pages long and I got a 100. Ended the class with a 98. Easy and fun class with a great professor.

Really enjoyed Prof. Morrison! She is a great teacher and I enjoyed going to class and learning from her. There was weekly homework assignments, three tests that were too hard, they were open book but the questions where SO confusing, I did much worse than I should have for this class. And a final presentation that is easy.
one assignment every two weeks, quizzes all online at home, super easy. Prof. Morrison is a great professor, she gives great feedback and actually makes class fun

She's a great leadership professor and her background in her profession really grows! Textbook is needed for weekly assignments. 2 exams, midterm, and final, all easy! (esp with textbook). Bonus if you have perfect attendance and participate in class! She's a great mentor to grow your career skills as well!
